text: The addition of extrafascial hysterectomy to standardized radiation therapy did not improve PFS or OS.It should be noted that (1) there was a lower cumulative incidence of local relapse at five years in the combined treatment regimen ( $2 7 \%$ versus $1 4 \%$ ) and (2) hysterectomy did not increase the frequency of reported grade 3-4 adverse effects.
